entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 13.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. POP 30%
